EmailTemplate.name: ATMaas.11-24-20 BNK ATM as a Service Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: 10 Satisfying Benefits of ATM as a Service
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Explore How ATM as a Service Frees Your FI to Focus on the Future ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Letting an experienced, strategic partner (and the world’s #1 ATM provider) take over the management of your ATM channel enables you to reap important rewards—whether you’re a large or small FI:
-
Simplify day-to-day operations
-
Achieve greater budget control
-
Innovate with a strategic partner for all things ATM-channel related
-
Remove hassle with a single point of accountability
-
Tighten security updates
-
Optimize total cost of ownership
-
Re-allocate internal resources
-
Improve focus on customer experience
-
Proactively respond to changing market requirements
-
Ensure high availability across your network
And that’s just in the near term.
Read more in our latest blog. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
